db:abstract.db:para: An application designed to browse the content of Bluetooth Low Energy peripheral devices. The example demonstrates the use of all Qt Bluetooth Low Energy classes.

db:article.db:programlisting:
TARGET = lowenergyscanner INCLUDEPATH += .
QT += quick bluetooth
# Input SOURCES += main.cpp \ device.cpp \ deviceinfo.cpp \ serviceinfo.cpp \ characteristicinfo.cpp
OTHER_FILES += assets/*.qml
HEADERS += \ device.h \ deviceinfo.h \ serviceinfo.h \ characteristicinfo.h
RESOURCES += \ resources.qrc
target.path = $$[QT_INSTALL_EXAMPLES]/bluetooth/lowenergyscanner INSTALLS += target
